text: Yu Zhenwei (; born 18 March 1986) is a retired Chinese athlete who competed in the long jump and triple jump. He represented his country at the 2010 IAAF World Indoor Championships and was a bronze medallist at the 2009 Asian Athletics Championships for the host nation.Zhenwei YU. All-Athletics. Retrieved on 2016-08-30.Zhenwei Yu. IAAF. Retrieved on 2016-08-30. Yu is a two-time world military champion, having won at the 2009 World Military Track and Field Championships and the 2011 Military World Games.Almeida, Renato (2009). CISM Yearbook 2009 . CISM. Retrieved on 2013-10-13.Final results. RIO 2011. Archived from the original on 2011-07-22.
